response.original_title: LiSA - LiVE is Smile Always ~PiNK & BLACK~ in Nippon Budokan "Ichigo Doughnut"
response.overview: LiSA's 3rd live video, featuring all 21 songs (planned) performed at the LiSA Live in Nippon Budokan on January 10th and 11th, 2015, on the 10th.  The  BD also includes bonus behind-the-scenes footage.  [Tracklist] M01 逆光オーケストラ M02 crossing field M03 妄想コントローラー M04 ミライカゼ M05 say my name の片想い M06 LOVER"S"MiLE M07 僕の言葉で M08 traumerei M09.ROCK-mode M10 KiSS me PARADOX M11 アシアトコンパス M12 BRiGHT FLiGHT M13 best day,best way M14 コズミックジェットコースター M15 WiLD CANDY M16 Rising Hope M17 I'm aRock star M18 シルシ [En] En01 東京ラヴソング En02 Little Braver En03 No More Time Machine
response.title: LiSA - LiVE is Smile Always ~PiNK & BLACK~ in Nippon Budokan "Ichigo Doughnut"
